title: COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 682/95 of 27 March 1995 extending the 1994/95 milk year
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 682/95 of 27 March 1995 extending the 1994/95 milk year
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 804/68 of 27 June 1968 on the common organization of  the market in milk and milk products  (1), and in particular Article 2 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the Commission,
Whereas the target price for milk and the intervention prices for butter and skimmed-milk powder  were fixed under the reform of the common agricultural policy by Regulation (EEC) No 2072/92  (2)  for the period 1 July 1993 to 30 June 1995; whereas the 1994/95 milk year should therefore be  extended until 30 June 1995,
main_body: The 1994/95 milk year shall end on 30 June 1995 and the 1995/96 milk  year shall begin on 1 July 1995.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 April 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 March 1995.
For the Council The President J. PUECH
